items: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons

blocks.name: Angelic Weapons
blocks.text: [name]'s weapon attacks are magical. When [name] hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 6d8 radiant damage (included in the attack).

blocks.name: Divine Awareness
blocks.text: [name] knows if it hears a lie.

blocks.name: Innate Spellcasting
blocks.text:
[name]'s spell casting ability is Charisma (spell save DC sdc[cha]). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

At will: *detect evil and good*, *invisibility* (self only)
3/day each: *blade barrier*, *dispel evil and good*, *resurrection*
1/day each: *commune*, *control weather*

blocks.name: Magic Resistance
blocks.text: [name] has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

blocks.name: Greatsword
blocks.text: *Melee Weapon Attack:* atk[str] to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit:* dmg[4d6 + str] slashing damage plus dmg[6d8] radiant damage.

blocks.name: Slaying Longbow
blocks.text: *Ranged Weapon Attack:* atk[dex] to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. *Hit:* dmg[2d8 + dex] piercing damage plus dmg[6d8] radiant damage. If the target is a creature that has 190 hit points or fewer, it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or die.

blocks.name: Flying Sword
blocks.text: [name] releases its greatsword to hover magically in an unoccupied space within 5 ft. of it. If [name] can see the sword, [name] can mentally command it as a bonus action to fly up to 50 ft. and either make one attack against a target or return to [name]'s hands. If the hovering sword is targeted by any effect, [name] is considered to be holding it. The hovering sword falls if [name] dies.

blocks.name: Healing Touch (4/Day)
blocks.text: [name] touches another creature. The target magically regains dmg[8d8 + 4] hit points and is freed from any curse, disease, poison, blindness, or deafness.

blocks.name: Teleport
blocks.text: [name] magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 ft. to an unoccupied space it can see.

blocks.name: Searing Burst (Costs 2 Actions)
blocks.text: [name] emits magical, divine energy. Each creature of its choice in a 10 -foot radius must make a DC 23 Dexterity saving throw, taking dmg[4d6] fire damage plus dmg[4d6] radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

blocks.name: Blinding Gaze (Costs 3 Actions)
blocks.text: [name] targets one creature it can see within 30 ft. of it. If the target can see it, the target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be blinded until magic such as the lesser restoration spell removes the blindness.

legendaryActions.description: [name] can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. [name] regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.
